front.title: IEEE Approved Draft Standard for DC (3200 V and below) Power Circuit Breakers Used in Enclosures

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard covers enclosed dc power circuit breakers of the stationary or drawout type of one- or two-pole construction with one or more rated maximum voltages of 300 V, 325 V, 600 V, 800 V, 1000 V, 1200 V, 1600 V, or 3200 V for applications on dc systems having nominal voltages of 250 V, 275 V, 500 V, 750 V, 850 V, 1000 V, 1500 V, or 3000 V, with general-purpose, high-speed, semi-high-speed and rectifier circuit breakers; manually or power-operated; and with or without electromechanical or electronic trip devices. It deals with service conditions, ratings, functional components, temperature limitations and classification of insulating materials, dielectric withstand voltage requirements, test procedures, and application.
